title: Product Launch and Campaign Budget Planning

decisions.decision: Launch the new product in the upcoming quarter with John creating the marketing plan and an August 1 deadline.

notes.excerpt: The team decided to launch the new product next quarter. John will prepare the marketing plan. The deadline is August 1st.

decisions.decision: Secure stakeholder approval for the initial campaign design by next week and schedule a review meeting for Friday.

notes.excerpt: We need to get stakeholder approval by next week.
I'll schedule the review meeting with the stakeholders for Friday.
